front.title: Routing Loops using ISATAP and 6to4: Problem Statement and Proposed Solutions

abstract.t: This document is concerned with security vulnerabilities in the ISATAP and 6to4 tunnels. These vulnerabilities allow an attacker to take advantage of inconsistencies between a tunnel's overlay IPv6 routing state and the native IPv6 routing state. The attacks form routing loops which can be abused as a vehicle for traffic amplification to facilitate DoS attacks. We describe these security vulnerabilities and the attacks which exploit them. We further recommend on solutions to remove the vulnerabilities.
